events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer position submitted by the candidate on our careers portal.
The candidate's application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department based on the resume's relevant experience.
A technical recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's interview process and communication moving forward.
Initial phone screening was conducted successfully to assess the candidateâ€™s experience and motivation for the software developer role.
The candidate responded promptly and confirmed availability for the upcoming technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th, with the engineering panel to evaluate key software development skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview demonstrating strong problem-solving ability and solid software engineering knowledge.
Following successful technical evaluation, the HR interview was scheduled to discuss compensation and cultural fit.
The HR interview was completed. The candidate expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team and asked relevant questions.
An official job offer was proposed to the candidate with details about salary, benefits, and starting date.
The candidate provided positive feedback and expressed excitement about the offer, requesting final clarification about team structure.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed the anticipated start date within the onboarding schedule.
Onboarding activities commenced with the candidate completing documentation and initial training about company engineering processes.
The engineering position was successfully closed with the candidate fully integrated into the development team.
